Text.val: Author: Peter van der Veen Created: june 2001
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
25.10.2010 SH SCR15906 Removed file handling for GNRL_CODE = DE/NL
07.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
18.08.2009 AS removed parameter from call to UFB500
19.02.2008 SH SCR13410 Removed SK/CZ bank file handling (BPH210E)
02.11.2007 SH SCR13076 Added logic to call BPH210IFB
03.05.2007 SH SCR12464 Moved call of BPH220 (submit) to the end of task
"Testing/storing I/O-Files" because of possible JOBL lockings, if the
delete / copy functions for the ASCII files needed too much time
24.04.2007 SH SCR3218 Removed NMBHNL parts from program, were never activated
22.09.2005 JJ SCR9088 SK now always uses FINSTA
26.04.2005 SH SCR8227 Since table TABLE_DEE was deleted, now table BNKA is used
to open the transaction
11.04.2005 SH SCR8119 If GNRL_CODE = 'SK' first start to check if CSOB format,
if True BPH210CSOB will be started, else BPH210FINSTA in started
23.02.2005 SH SCR7801 Added cal to BPH201E_NEW, will be called if GSET_YESNO =
'Y', where GSET_ID = 1000
18.01.2005 SH SCR7473 Fixed bug null date according to entered date for DTAUS
17.01.2004 SH SCR7669 Added filehandling for country 'SK', uses now the old CSOB
format from 'CZ'
06.01.2004 SH SCR7473 Added validation of v.DATE with GB005, for the necessary
value date, has to be entered by user, for DTAUS
29.07.2004 SH SCR6611 Removed special test for PL if it's the old/new HANDLOWY
- format; only the new HANDLOWY format will be used now
03.05.2004 SH SCR6026 Added special test for "PL"; if first field contains
a - (hyphen) then he old version of BPH210F has to be called , else the new one
07.04.2004 SH SCR5890 Added v.Filename to argument list for BPH210B and BPH210D
04.11.2003 SH SCR4673 Removed format CSOB for countreis "CZ" and "SK"
28.08.2003 SH SCR4212 Remove the file with suffix 'run' from the bankdirectory
- if the user pressed Cancel in the task where he can change the date for DTAUS
28.08.2003 SH SCR3974 Send '*.run' as PI.MASK to UFB500, to check if there is a
file with the suffix 'run' exists in the banks directory
27-AUG-2003 AS, additional parameter for UFB500
21.08.2003 SH SCR4092 Added new fromat "HANDLOWY" for bankfiles in PL
14.08.2003 SH SCR4064 Added new format "FINSTA" for bankfiles in CZ or SK
05.08.2003 SH SCR3974 Changed logic of testing files with suffix "run", prevent
- multiple handling of bankfiles at the same time with multiple MAGIC-Sessions
- (for details see SCR 3974)
20.06.2003 SH SCR3641 Splitted message for BMQ001 in two parts with UFB561
28.01.2003 SH SCR2768 Add Diologbox "Set DATES for DATUS" to enter a date
- for BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT and BADT_PAYMENTVALUEDATE for BPH210
- DTAUS
26.09.2002 Add new format DTAUS (INHOUSE)
10.09.2002 SH Enabled writing errors into MQ and use "12" to write messages to
- MQDT
02.09.2002 SCR2003 SH Disabled writing errors into MQ
14.08.2002 SCR1904 SH Check if directories "HANDLED" and "ERROR" exist, if
- not they will be created by UFB548. If it was not possible to create the
- directories give message and program will be ended immediately
24.07.2002 SH renamed some virtuals
17.07.2002 SH Solved BUG of changes from the 02.07.2002, message was also
- shown for format DTAUS
02.07.2002 SH Add messages if all payments handled or not all payments handled,
- only for formats SWIFT and CSOB
03.06.2002 SH Modified BPH210 according to new SPECS, Handling files for
-- different countries ("DE", "CZ")
25.03.2002 SH Call BPH220 as submit serverjob --> use GB701
-- SCR#604 23.01.2002 St. Huppertz (Changes in format DTAUS, Currency)
-- Relevant to call BPH210 Moduls for different countries
-- if there exists a I/O-File with the suffix '.run' BPH211 stops immediately
-- need to move the I/O-File and rename the filename
-- Only needed for I/O-Format --> DTAUS, the original I/O-File has to be
-- converted (insert line breaks) before we can read the file
-- Used as argument for storing bankfiles <> DTAUS
-- needed for errohandling
-- Only for fileformat "DTAUS"
-- We have to delete the special controlfile outside the transaction, because
-- it's not possible to delete an I/O-File which already opened by MAGIC
-- Only if erros occurs
-- If no errors occurs
-- All payments handled
-- Not all payments handled
-- ATTENTION: This task open a transaction, therefore table "BNKA" is
-- selected in the DB_TABLES.
-- DO NOT DELETE THIS TABEL IN THE DB-TABLES!!!!!
-- If the table was deleted the hole structure of BPH210 will damaged, means the
-- function "ROLLBACK" doesn't work and this is for BPH210 extremely importantly
Formats for county = 'PL'
// Actual runnumber, comes from BPH210 --> need to call BPH220
// Uses only for dispaly in the messagebox
-- Automatic handling files from banks (BPH 220)
-- Read files from GNRD dirotory (Type=8)
-- There is already a I/O-File with the suffix '.run' --> ERROR
-- It's not allowed to start BPH210 with multiple MAGIC-Session to
-- import more than one bankfile at the same time; otherwise we get
-- problems with storing BADT/BADP rows (BADP_DAILYRUNNUMBER)
-- Get Filename from PI.Filelocation
-- Build temp working path and filename with suffix "run" to prevent multiple
-- handling of bankfiles
-- Filesuffix will separate with '.'
-- Filesuffix will separate without '.'
-- The handled file has to copied to GNRD_PATH (Type=8) to prevent multiple
-- handling of bankfiles (Prevent problems in different import programs)
-- Check for existing path in which the errors has to be written
-- Build pathname and filename for handled files
-- Check for existing path in which the handled files has to be moved
-- The directories \HANDLE\ and \ERROR\ does not exist and it was not
-- possible to create them automatically with UFB548
-- Start importing of selected file
-- Test files for country = 'PL'
-- Dispaly how many payments will be imported
// If not one of the valid structures --> ERROR
-- Before a rollback will be started we have to delete the temporay I/O_Filename
-- with suffix ".run" from GNRD_PATH (Type=8)
-- Store HANDLOWY for country = 'PL'
// File stored successfully, no messages have to be written
-- After programs finished their work, the I/O-File has to be moved in
-- the folder \HANDLED\ and the *.run file has to be deleted from
-- GNRD_PATH (Type=8)
-- Need to show massage, see parenttask only for bankfiles <> DTAUS
Detect first row
-- Skip records if the record only included extended payment
descriptions; recordslenght must > 70 then it's a payment
@ Uses to dispaly how many payments have to be imported
-- Get message text, messagebox will not be opened
-- Open message box
